CustomField.formula: CASE(Unit_of_Measure__c, "Pound (lb)", Projected_CM_2_Year__c * 2.20462, "Kilogram (kg)", Projected_CM_2_Year__c, "Hundred Weight (CWT)", Projected_CM_2_Year__c * 50.8023, "Metric Ton (MT)", Projected_CM_2_Year__c * 2205, "Each (EA)", Projected_CM_2_Year__c * Product__r.EAtoKGConversionRate__c, "Gallon (GAL)", Projected_CM_2_Year__c * Product__r.GALtoKGConversionRate__c, "Case", Projected_CM_2_Year__c * Product__r.CASEtoKGConversionRate__c, "Liter", Projected_CM_2_Year__c * Product__r.LITERtoKGConversionRate__c, 0)
CustomField.label: Projected Volume CM KG (2-Year)
